text:
="preserve">Carlotta Barilli (2 September 1935 – 15 July 2020) was an Italian actress. She was born in Parma, Italy. Barilli was known for her roles in "Ragazzi del Juke-Box" (1959), "Howlers in the Dock" (1960) and "La commare secca" (1962). She appeared in many movies directed by Bernardo Bertolucci.
Barilli died on 15 July 2020 in Rome, aged 84.
